maml:description.maml:para: This function is monitoring group(s) in Active Directory and sends an email when someone is changing the membership.
This function is monitoring group(s) in Active Directory and sends an email when someone is changing the membership. It will also report the Change History made for this/those group(s).

You can provide a prefix for the E-Mail subject
You must specify the destination E-Mail Address

You must specify at least one file

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will query the group 'Domain Admins' and send an email to 'To@Company.com' using the address 'From@Company.com' and the server 'mail.company.com'.
